name: Fallen London: For All the Saints Who From Their Labours Rest
storyline: Join an Intrepid Deacon on a deadly mission for the Church. Hunt for a missing saint, infiltrate the Brass Embassy and uncover the hidden history of Hell. What will you give up to learn the truth?
summary: An addon for Fallen London. The Exceptional Story for September, 2018. First entry in the Season of Celebrations.
